Plot: Comedy about the daily lives of a semiluxury cruise's crew and the committed situations that will lead their life together in this vast floating city. Thus we find the captain of the ship ...
Title: Anclados
Writer: Nando Abad, Raúl Díaz, Iñaki San Román, Julián Sastre, Arantxa Écija, Daniel Écija
Actors: Miren Ibarguren, Alfonso Lara, Joaquín Reyes, Úrsula Corberó
